snippet: Capping a spate of strong I.P.O. this week, Workday, the software company, opened 72 percent above its offering price of $28 in its debut on Friday, on heavy trading volume.
abstract: Capping a spate of strong I.P.O. this week, Workday, the software company, opened 72 percent above its offering price of $28 in its debut on Friday, on heavy trading volume.

headline.print_headline: Workday Posts a Big Gain at Its I.P.O.
